overview: In 2010, a ginger boy came out the clos- I mean pantry, and he gave Andrew cereal. He traumatized Andrew and exactly one year later, after Andrew had moved to a new house, he came back. Since then, Andrew has dedicated his life to finding and stopping this man. It's been especially hard because the ginger hasn't shown up since 2011.
tagline: You want to eat some cereal?
title: The Cereal Man
